name: SKS Inc.
bullet1: custom Active Links where route names and path names are sent as children. Conditional rendering is executed.
bullet2: User-protected and admin-protected routes, JWT token verification, 401, 403 status appended.
bullet3: Admin dashboard is introduced. JWT and admin verifying middle tire functions are enacted on the server-side.
bullet4: Transformed the project into full-stack applying React.js, Node.js, Express.js, Firebase, React form hook, and MongoDB.
fea1: Complete Project is implementd in SPA (Single Page Application) method using reactJs
fea2: Admin Dashboard Implemented. Admin verification is applied to both server and client side. RequireAdmin custom hooks is introduced to protect urls at client side.
fea3: VerifyAdmin and verify jwt token middle tire function added to server side to secure APIs
fea5: Custom Animation Button is used and Whole site is responsive for PC and Mobile.
fea6: Conditional rendering is applied and Context API are executed
fea7: 401 status for JWT Token invalid and 403 status for expired JWT Token asserted
fea8: Login Process verified by Firebase and JWT token is ssued to every user by the login
fun1: After order placement redirect to My Order page where Payment option available to accomplesh payment.
fun2: With payment stock quantity reduced and order database updated.
fun3: Dashboard route is protected and require login to access it
fun4: An Admin can make a user admin also can remove a user from admin panel.
fun5: User can provide review and update their profile in their dashboard
fun6: Email varification is added when a user is registered by email & password.
fun7: If a route is not exists then 404 page is showed
fun8: Login and Log out page and can be toggled between them and Password reset link added.
tech: React Query, Firebase, stripeJs, daisyUI, Tailwind CSS, React Form Hook, React Firebase Hook, React Router, React Toastify,  date-fns, CORS, dotenv, Express.Js, nodemon, MongoDB, and heroku to live server.

name: Tech Hub
bullet1: Revamp development by implementing Conditional rendering and Protected route enacted on the client-side.
bullet2: The stock of products in the warehouse keeps updated and wholesalers can place orders.
bullet3: Enhanced the project acceptance utilizing React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, Firebase, React Form Hooks, and Axios.
fea1: Complete Project is implementd in SPA (Single Page Application) method using reactJs
fea2: Verify jwt token middle tire function added to server side to secure APIs
fea3: Animation Banner is used and Whole site is responsive for PC and Mobile.
fea4: Conditional rendering is applied and If a route is not exists then 404 page is showed.
fea5: 401 status for JWT Token invalid and 403 status for expired JWT Token asserted
fea6: Login Process verified by Firebase and JWT token is ssued to every user by the login
fun1: Email varification is added when a user is registered by email & password and password reset system is assigned.
fun2: Different Login and Log out page and can be toggled between them.
fun3: Manage Inventory route shows all inventories and Review Inventory enables user to update stock.
fun4: My item only shows the that are added by the logged in user/employee.
fun5: Conditional rendering in route management and headers.
tech: Axios, Firebase, Tailwind CSS, React Form Hook, React Firebase Hook, React Router, React Toastify, MUI Icons, CORS, dotenv, Express.Js, nodemon, MongoDB, and heroku to live server.

name: Travel With Elina
bullet1: Employing React.js, React Router, Bootstrap, etc coalesce with the authentication by Firebase.
bullet2: Custom active Links, Custom hook imposed.
bullet3: Users can choose or customize tour packages according to their choice and confirm bookings.
fea1: Navbar all route link are customised and shows active route.
fea2: Home page conatins bannaer, services, Slider. You can choose any service from home and enjoy the journey as per your desire.
fea3: Footer part posses an upper arrow key which navigates to navigate to header banner.
fea4: Sign In and Sign Up can be toggled as per user need and Email varification is added when user sign up.
fea5: Password reset option is added in case user forgot password.
fea6: Entire Website is responsive to different devices.
tech: React.Js, Firebase, React Bootstrap, React Firebase Hook, React Router, React Toastify, Analog Clock React

name: Product Analysis
bullet1: custom Active Links. Conditional rendering is executed.
bullet2: User-protected routes and does not redirect to login after reloading.
bullet3: Executed Technologies are React.js, Recharts, Firebase,React Router, React Firebase Hook, Vanilla CSS.
fea1: Home page shows heading and some related text and a button that navigate to about page route. Also 3 reviews as examples. buttom of home page a navigation button that navigate to review page.
fea2: In review page, 6 of many reviews are presented.
fea3: In Analysis page(Route) we have shown some graphical presentation of monthly sell and investment Vs revenue in 5 different charts of different methods.
fea4: FAQ section shows some frequently asked question and answer.
fea5: About page shows our address and more
fea6: Entire Website is responsive to different devices.
fea7: we have created Notfound page if anyone want to route in a non existing page.
fea8: Two Custom hooks is used to load data from local DB for chart and review.

name: Treatise Chooser
bullet1: A user can choose 5 books and we will recommend one among them randomly to help used in desiding.
bullet2: User can add a book to his cart
bullet3: Hole site is responsive for Mobile and PC.
